mapper.select:
select
distinct
from n25175_user
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT * FROM n25175_admin LEFT JOIN n25175_user ON a_id = u_aid WHERE DATE_FORMAT( u_born, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) AND a_status <> 2 AND a_status <> 9 ORDER BY u_born
